info.title: Binar Bank Challenge Chapter 5 API Documentation
info.description:
This is a part of Binar JavaScript Backend Bootcamp - FGA Batch 2 Challenge Chapter 4 & 5. 
The challenge is to build a _simple_ Bank System REST API where can handle basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, dan Delete) operations.

The REST API for now only supported on your localhost server, please provide and define your .env file.

**Documentation will update accordingly**.

Below are the detailed information on how to use the API, including all endpoints to use, request methods, and example responses.



Some useful link(s):
- [Binar BE Challenge CH4 Repository](https://github.com/jhontriboyke/binar-be-challenge-ch4)

message.example: You do not have permission to access this resource

requestBody.description: Create a new user by passing request body

get.description: Retrieve an user by user id as parameter

403 User.description: When user access another user detail

put.description: Update a user by it's id

message.example: Please provide valid identity type (KTP, KK, or Passport)

200 User (empty).description: If user did not have any accounts

requestBody.description: Create a new account by passing request body

get.description: Retrieve an account by account id as parameter

200 Admin.description: Retrieve all accounts by Admin role

200 User.description: Retrieve all accounts by User role
Get all transactions by User access role

get.description: Retrieve an transaction by transaction id as parameter

requestBody.description: Create a new deposit transaction by passing request body

201 User.description: Create deposit transaction by User access role

requestBody.description: Create a new withdraw transaction by passing request body

201 User.description: Create withdraw transaction by User access role

requestBody.description: Create a new transfer transaction by passing request body

201 User.description: Create transfer transaction by User access role
